thread.title: Birthday in NYC - Eventi made it fabulous!!!
thread.title_full: Birthday in NYC - Eventi made it fabulous!!! - Review of Kimpton Hotel Eventi, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Adc1973
title: Birthday in NYC - Eventi made it fabulous!!!
text: My boyfriend and I recently came to New York for his birthday and stayed at the wonderful Eventi Hotel!!!! I can't say enough great things about this hotel!! The service...the rooms...the restaurants...the drinks!!!! They were all 5 star!!!! We will never stay anywhere else in NYC!!! It was one of the best vacations we have ever had!! Thank you Eventi!!! We will be back very soon!!!
